name: Terroir (85% Dark): Mankuva, Konnathady, Kerala (Single Origin Dark Chocolate)
description:
A 85% dark chocolate bar made with a special blend of two micro-lots, to give the chocolate a bouquet of flavors.

The cacao beans were roasted medium, hence creating Floral notes along with Red Cherry and Maple.

Cacao Origin: Mankuva, Konnathady, Kerala

Roast Profile: Medium Roast

Cacao Percentage: 85% Dark Chocolate

Tasting Notes: Floral, Red Cherry and Maple

Allergens: None (Vegan)

Note: Orders below ₹2500 in value are subject to a shipping charge of ₹300. Coffee and chocolate orders above ₹2500 are applicable for free shipping. 

*Processed and Manufactured in a facility that processes Dairy, Gluten and Nuts

name: Fermentation Fantasies: Hops Fermented Cacao (60% Dark)
description:
Hops, the hero in Fermentation Fantasies' tales. The subtle catalyst behind craft beer's bitterness, flavor, and aroma. We, at Subko, have applied it's magic to cacao processing, unveiling refined, distinct profile. The cacao beans were roasted dark, hence creating a unique flavor profile to enjoy.

Cacao Origin: Subko VLGE Co-op, West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh

Roast Profile: 60%, Dark roast

Tasting notes: IPA craft beer, raw mango, pineapple candy

Allergens: Vegan

Note: Orders below ₹2500 in value are subject to a shipping charge of ₹300. Coffee and chocolate orders above ₹2500 are applicable for free shipping. 

*Processed and Manufactured in a facility that processes Dairy, Gluten and Nuts

name: Fermentation Fantasies: Carbonic Macerated Cacao (70% Dark)
description:
The key inspiration behind using carbonic maceration for dark chocolate is to unlock new, refined flavors that differ from typical chocolate experiences, offering a fresh take on the classic dark chocolate profile. It also connects the world of fine chocolate to the growing appreciation of terroir and fermentation, much like in the wine industry.

Cacao Origin: Subko VLGE Co-op, West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh

Roast Profile: 70%, Light roast

Tasting notes: Mandarin, yuzu, milky

Allergens: Vegan

Note: Orders below ₹2500 in value are subject to a shipping charge of ₹300. Coffee and chocolate orders above ₹2500 are applicable for free shipping.

name: Jashn Ka Taufah: Spicy Coated Chocolate + Spread | Subko Coffee Roasters
description:
For chocolate enthusiasts: a duo of Fine Cacao selections.

What’s Inside the Box?

1) Coated: Podi Milk Chocolate Almonds (150gms) x 1
A unique fusion of South Indian Mulagapodi Gunpowder Masala and specialty milk chocolate, creating a bold Indian twist on Mexican Chili Chocolate.

Made with traceable, house-made Podi Masala, infused into single-origin 45% milk chocolate sourced from Thekkinthandu, Kerala, and centered around roasted almonds for a satisfying crunch. Experience an oscillating flavor journey between spicy and sweet!

Allergens: Contains Nuts and Dairy (Vegetarian)

2) Hazelnut-Based Milk Chocolate Spread x 1
A creamy, nutty, and ultra-luxurious hazelnut milk chocolate spread, made with hyper-traceable, locally sourced ingredients and zero palm oil. This is Subko Cacao’s version of a spreadable Rocher, featuring Turkish Hazelnuts blended with single-origin cacao from Kaithapara, Kerala. Enjoy it on toast, biscuits, cakes, pancakes, in smoothies, or straight from the spoon!
Cacao Origin: Kaithapara, Kerala
Allergens: Contains Dairy and Nuts (Vegetarian)

Please note that your order will be delivered in 7-10 days due to specific shipping requirements for items containing spreads.

If you want a customized gift hamper for your loved one, please reach out to gifting@subko.coffee or WhatsApp on +91 79777 55675

name: Dil Se Taufah: Spicy Coated Chocolate + Chocolate Minis + Spread |  Subko Coffee Roasters
description:
For chocolate evangelists: a bundle of Fine Cacao selections.

What’s Inside the Box:
1) Hazelnut-Based Milk Chocolate Spread x 1
A creamy, nutty, and ultra-luxurious hazelnut milk chocolate spread, made with hyper-traceable, locally sourced ingredients and zero palm oil. This is Subko Cacao’s version of a spreadable Rocher, featuring Turkish Hazelnuts blended with single-origin cacao from Kaithapara, Kerala. Enjoy it on toast, biscuits, cakes, pancakes, in smoothies, or straight from the spoon!
Cacao Origin: Kaithapara, Kerala
Allergens: Contains Dairy and Nuts (Vegetarian)

2) Coated: Podi Milk Chocolate Almonds (250gms) x 1
A unique fusion of South Indian Mulagapodi Gunpowder Masala and specialty milk chocolate, creating a bold Indian twist on Mexican Chili Chocolate.

Made with traceable, house-made Podi Masala, infused into single-origin 45% milk chocolate sourced from Thekkinthandu, Kerala, and centered around roasted almonds for a satisfying crunch. Experience an oscillating flavor journey between spicy and sweet!
Allergens: Contains Nuts and Dairy (Vegetarian)

3) Dark/Milk/White Mini Collection Box x 1
A meticulously crafted collection of 4 mini bars (15g each), offering a diverse chocolate experience, from dark to milk to white chocolate.

a) When Coffee Met Cacao (63% Dark) x 1 – A rich and bold chocolate blending single-origin cacao from Varanashi Farms, Karnataka with Project Pearl specialty coffee from Ratnagiri Estate.
Allergens: No Allergens (Vegan)

b) The Salty One (65% Dark) x 1 – A Himalayan Pink Salt-infused dark chocolate bar made with traceable cacao beans from West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh.
Allergens: No Allergens (Vegan)

c) The Classic One (45% Milk) x 1 – A nostalgic milk chocolate bar, featuring Forastero cacao from Thekkinthandu, Kerala and A2 milk powder from Native Farms, Maharashtra.
Allergens: Contains Dairy (Vegetarian)

d) The Flat White (37% White) x 1 – A coffee-infused white chocolate bar, combining Project Pearl Arabica Microlot Coffee with A2 milk powder for an espresso-like creamy indulgence.
Cacao Butter Origin: Kaithapara, Kerala
Coffee Origin: Ratnagiri Estate (Project Pearl), Chikmagalur, Karnataka
Allergens: Contains Dairy (Vegetarian)

Please note that your order will be delivered in 7-10 days due to specific shipping requirements for items containing spreads.

name: Mohabbat ka Taufah: Drip Coffee Bags + Chocolate Series |  Subko Coffee Roasters
description:
A dual treat for Specialty Coffee and Fine Cacao lovers: Our bundle of a convenient Portable Pourover (choose between Subko VLGE Blend or Project Pearl) and a collection of 5 full bars from our Dark/Milk/White chocolate series.

What’s Inside the Box?
1) Choose Your Subko Pourtable Pourover (Box of 6)
Experience handcrafted specialty coffee in a convenient, single-use drip coffee bag. Perfect for brewing anywhere—just add hot water! Choose between:

- Project Pearl, Ratnagiri Estate, Karnataka – A floral, fruit-forward specialty Arabica blend that offers an elevated coffee experience. OR
- Subko VLGE Blend, Padera, Andhra Pradesh – A rich and layered coffee profile with notes of hazelnut praline, plum jam, and milk chocolate.

Forget instant coffee—this is instant you. Ready whenever and wherever you need it.

2) Dark/Milk/White (Full) Bars (50gms each): x 5
An exquisite collection of five full-sized chocolate bars, spanning the flavors of dark, milk, and white chocolate.
a) When Coffee Met Cacao (63% Dark) x 1 – A tribute to Karnataka’s Kaapi Culture, blending single-origin cacao from Varanashi Farms with Project Pearl specialty coffee.

b) The Salty One (65% Dark) x 1 – A bold dark chocolate infused with Himalayan Pink Salt, made with traceable cacao beans from West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh.

c) The Classic One (45% Milk) x 1 – A nostalgic milk chocolate experience, crafted with Forastero cacao from Thekkinthandu, Kerala and A2 milk powder from Native Farms, Maharashtra.

d) The Flat White (37% White) x 1 – A coffee-infused white chocolate bar, merging Project Pearl Arabica Microlot Coffee with A2 milk powder for a creamy, espresso-like indulgence.

e) The Vanilla White Bar (39% White) x 1 – A smooth, gourmet white chocolate made with A2 skimmed milk powder from Gir Cows and single-origin cacao butter from Andhra Pradesh.

Allergen Information:
Vegan: When Coffee Met Cacao, The Salty One
Contains Dairy (Vegetarian): The Classic One, The Flat White, The Vanilla White Bar

If you want a customized gift hamper for your loved one, please reach out to gifting@subko.coffee or WhatsApp on +91 79777 55675

name: Beta Bites: Eclair Toffee, Reimagined (Pack of 3) (45 pcs)
description:
An ode to the classic eclair toffee. But flipped into reverse gear. Chewy craft caramel on the inside, a rich layer of single origin cacao powered 70% Dark Chocolate from the Subcontinent on the outside.

Inspired by the layered, sonic warmth of Peter Cat Recording Co., a band with the rare ability to imbibe feelings of modernity and nostalgia in unison. It's a nod to the chocolates of yore, reimagined for the craft present.

For adults and kids alike. Because in the end, everybody is somebody's beta. Good Luck.

Chocolate Type: 70% Dark Chocolate

Fillings: Chewy Salted Caramel

Cacao Origin: West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh

Allergens: Contains Dairy (Veg.)

Box Contents: 15 pcs/box (Set of 3 Boxes)

Note: Orders below ₹2500 in value are subject to a shipping charge of ₹300. Coffee and chocolate orders above ₹2500 are applicable for free shipping.

*Processed and Manufactured in a facility that processes Dairy, Gluten and Nuts

name: The Subko Tote V2 : Specialty Robusta Edition
description:
The Tote; sturdy, practical, cotton canvas bag that is made to last. Reintroduced in original form, with a transfer printed Subko's Specialty Robusta Stamp.

Product Specifications:
Dimensions : 16 inches Height x 13.5 inches Width

name: [4 Days a Week] MYOB: Make Your Own (Chocolate) Bar
description:
Our MYOB activity at The Cacao Mill, where the Experiential Table transforms into a gateway to the process of making your own Craft Chocolate bar.

Highly customisable, super fun, and as experimental or classic as you like. MYOB, guided by our Craft Chocolate experts at The Cacao Mill, is as simple as it is fun.

Date:  Every Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday

Time: Tuesdays and Thursdays (4 PM to 7PM), Saturdays and Sundays (11 AM - 7 PM)

Venue: The Cacao Mill, Colaba

 

What to expect:

 

MAKE YOUR OWN (CHOCOLATE) BAR. Your chocolate, your way.

  • Step 1: Purchase your ticket at the till, and present it to the chef at the Experiential Table.
  • Step 2: Pick your Craft Chocolate, from dark and milk to white, all made with fine cacao sourced from West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh.
  • Step 3: Get creative and choose from a set of rotational toppings to add to your chocolate bar - croissant thins, cacao nibs and more.
  • Step 4: Browse through The Cacao Mill, allowing our chocolate experts to let your bar set and package it up for you.

Bite into your customized chocolate bar creation while you’re there, or take it home with you to savor over the next couple of days. There are no rules, really.

Terms and Conditions
  • We love your company and we would be anticipating your arrival at least twenty minutes prior to the starting time.
  • Tickets once purchased are non-refundable.

name: [Every Weekend] DYOC: Dip Your Own Cookie / Croissant
description:
Dip Your Own Cookie/Croissant is a customisable cookie and croissant experience with rotational toppings that you can layer onto your creation, guided by our Craft Chocolate experts at The Cacao Mill. Rotational toppings that you can layer onto your creation, guided by our Craft Chocolate experts at The Cacao Mill.

Think of a chocolate fountain, cascading with different types of Craft Chocolate, and watch the stream coat your preferred cookie or croissant.

WHAT TO EXPECT?

We like getting our hands messy at Subko Cacao, and we like it even better when our creations from the Subko Bakehouse get messy with us.


Step 1: Choose your Cookie or Croissant

Like to keep things classic? Stick to our Subko Signature Croissant, or choose from the Kashmiri Walnut Sea Salt Chocochip Cookie or the PB&J Cookie.

Step 2: Pick Your Chocolate

How dark do you like your chocolate to be? Not too much? We got you either way.

Choose your preferred tempered chocolate from three versions: 70% Dark Chocolate, 45% Milk Chocolate, 39% White Chocolate - all from West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh.

Step 3: Add Toppings
The Cacao Mill’s your oyster. Pick from a set of rotational toppings to adorn your cookie/croissant with.


Step 4: Devour your customized creation

Venue: The Cacao Mill, Colaba

Dates: Every Weekend, Saturdays & Sundays

Timings: 4:00 PM - 7:00 PM


Terms and Conditions
  • We love your company and we would be anticipating your arrival at least twenty minutes prior to the starting time.
  • Tickets once purchased are non-refundable.

name: Let's Chocolate [Pan-India]
description:
A photobook made in collaboration with photographer Rid Burman and multidisciplinary artist Aniruddh Mehta.

Photographed in this book are the humans who construct the infrastructure & assemble machines that are required for an artisan chocolate factory to exist.
A raw, unfiltered book with honest faces; and messy too.

Pages : 38 Pages Incl. Cover
Close Size : 7.72" (W) x 9.88"
(H)

About the Artists

Rid Burman

Rid Burman is a photographer born in India in the early 80s. He has his roots in a family of sculptors and painters. Naturally, art has always been a priority in Burman's approach to photography. After graduating from the Brooks Institute of Photography in California in 2000, Burman moved to New York and worked as an assistant for Steven Klein and Mark Seliger. He returned to India in 2008 and started collaborating with with prestigious brands, also with magazines such as Elle and Vogue to name a very few. He has a certain propensity to create unique stories and a vision of his own. Always on the move, Burman works between Paris, New York and Mumbai, constantly exploring new ideas, new places, drawing on the abundant inspirations of his Eastern and Western philosophies.

Aniruddh Mehta

Aniruddh Mehta is an Artist and a Designer based in Mumbai, India. His work ranges from traditional graphic design as well as digital and new media arts. His practices traverse through various mediums with a common theme rooted in precise organization.

He is the founder of Studio Bigfat - a multi-disciplinary design studio focusing on a broad spectrum of design areas such as Branding, Packaging, Brand Strategy, Graphic Design, Digital Illustration and Motion Design. The studio has worked with a long list of clientele; some of which includes Facebook, Puma, Apple, Gates Foundation, LVMH, Subko Coffee, etc.

Please note: Cost includes shipping and will be shipped separately from the rest of the order. It will take 3-5 days to deliver.

Fillings: Roasted Hazelnuts, White and Dark Hazelnut Spread 

Allergens: Contains Nuts and Dairy (Veg.)

Note: Orders below ₹2500 in value are subject to a shipping charge of ₹300. Coffee and chocolate orders above ₹2500 are applicable for free shipping. 

*Processed and Manufactured in a facility that processes Dairy, Gluten and Nuts

name: Big Cube: Almond Sea Buckthorn
description:
In this rendition of Big Cubes, we proudly showcase a tangy Sea Buckthorn Jam, made with sea buckthorn that has been meticulously sourced from Leh/Ladakh as an integral facet of Project Roots in collaboration with Chef Prateek Sadhu.

Nestled within, you'll discover an Almond Praline Filling, crafted to harmonize with the sweet and sour notes of the jam. All of these elements are enclosed within a shell of 70% Dark Chocolate made with Subko Cacao.

Fillings: Tangy Himalayan Jam, Chunky Almond Filling

Allergens: Contains Nuts and Dairy (Veg.)

Note: Orders below ₹2500 in value are subject to a shipping charge of ₹300. Coffee and chocolate orders above ₹2500 are applicable for free shipping. 

*Processed and Manufactured in a facility that processes Dairy, Gluten and Nuts

name: I Would Like A Croissant: A Photobook
description:
It has long been believed that ‘craft’ had spatial limitations; that outside of the 5th arrondissement, and Byculla of all places, a croissant rooted in ‘craft’ philosophy was a chimera; This photobook is evidence, irony, and beyond belief, all at once.

Rid Burman’s allegorical projection of craft intersecting the unlikeliest of places.

Please note: Cost includes shipping and will be shipped separately from the rest of the order. It will take 3-5 days to deliver.
